questions.question: What was one major economic effect of British rule on India?
questions.answer: Economic exploitation

questions.question: Which sector was most affected by British policies?
questions.answer: Agriculture

questions.question: What happened to Indian handicrafts during British rule?
questions.answer: They declined

questions.question: Which system led to exploitation of farmers?
questions.answer: Zamindari system

questions.question: British rule introduced which new transport system?
questions.answer: Railways

questions.question: Which language became important during British rule?
questions.answer: English

questions.question: What was a positive effect of British rule?
questions.answer: Modern education

questions.question: Which law system was introduced by the British?
questions.answer: Modern judicial system

questions.question: What was the social impact of British rule?
questions.answer: Spread of equality ideas

questions.question: Overall British rule in India can be described as ____.
questions.answer: Mixed impact

questions.question: Overall British rule in India can be described as ____.
questions.answer: Mixed impact

questions.question: What were the economic effects of British rule on India?
questions.answer: British rule led to economic exploitation, decline of industries and poverty in India.

questions.question: How did British rule affect Indian agriculture?
questions.answer: Farmers were exploited through heavy taxes and unfair land revenue systems.

questions.question: What happened to Indian handicrafts during British rule?
questions.answer: Indian handicrafts declined due to competition from British machine-made goods.

questions.question: Mention two positive effects of British rule.
questions.answer: Modern education system and development of transport and communication.

questions.question: Why is British rule said to have a mixed impact on India?
questions.answer: It caused exploitation but also introduced modern education and administration.
